about_me.en: I am Minqiang Zhou, a second-year master student from Xiamen University, advised by Professor Zhirong Shen. I am a system researcher. My research focus is Disaggregated Memory. I am so excited about the LSM tree.
about_me.zh: 我是周敏强，来自厦门大学计算机技术专业的二年级硕士研究生，导师是沈志荣教授。我是一名系统研究员。我的研究重点是分散式存储。我对 LSM 树非常感兴趣。

en.major: Department of Computer Science, Xiamen University
Department of Computer Science, Wuhan University of Technology

zh.major: 厦门大学计算机科学系
